  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/873</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com es classifiquen les oracions?</string>
            <string language="en">How are clauses classified?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie werden Klauseln eingestuft?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment est-ce que des clauses sont classifiées 
?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como as cláusulas são classificadas?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come le clausole sono classificate?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς οι προτάσεις ταξινομούνται;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre la classificació de les oracions a partir del verb i els seus complements: copulatives, atributives i predicatives.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on the classification of clauses based on the verb and its complements: copulative, attributive and predicative.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">Andorra</string>
            <string language="en">Andorra</string>
            <string language="es">Andorra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">sintaxi</string>
            <string language="en">syntax</string>
            <string language="es">sintaxis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf der 
Klassifikation der Klauseln, die auf dem Verb und seinen Ergänzungen 
basieren: copulative, attributiv und Aussage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur la classification des 
clauses basées sur le verbe et ses compléments : copulative, 
attributif et prédicatif.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) na classificação das 
cláusulas baseadas no verbo e em seus complementos: copulative,
attributive e predicative.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sulla classificazione delle 
clausole basate sul verbo e sui relativi complementi: 
copulative, attributivo e predicativo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στην ταξινόμηση των προτάσεων
βασισμένων στο ρήμα και τα συμπληρώματά του: συνδετικός, 
επιθετικός και predicative.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Andorra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Syntax</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Andorre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">syntaxe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Andorra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sintaxe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Andorra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sintassi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανδόρρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύνταξη</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
